lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: we're all in it together

lender.name: Starling T Hunt
lender.loan_because: Change only happens when people stand up and make change. Keep moving forward is my life statement.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: self-sufficiency is a critical component of self-respect. I have recently been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer and feel the appreciation of the totality of my life every day. I will continue to share as much of this joy as long as I can so that others may share as they grow.

lender.name: MARK
lender.loan_because:
Good Day,
I am Bars.Mark Garry by name and am a private loan lender.Do you need financial assistance?Do you need a loan to start a Large Scale business or Mortgage loans, Business Loans, International Loans, Personal Loans and Exclusive loan.It will be my pleasure to help Men and Women who are in need and you most not have everything to get this loan,also know is with a low % Contact us today at::mr.markgarry@yahoo.co.nz
lender.occupational_info: Am here to be help to people.

lender.name: Brooklyn
lender.loan_because: I am a displaced worked and I am currently unemployed however, I always try to look at the brighter side of things. I still have it a lot better than most so what ever I have to spare, I am willing to give. I know that God will supply my every need, so until then I will do my best to supply the needs of others.
lender.occupational_info: (Formerly)...I worked for a software company where I performed complex software migrations for over 400 financial institutions.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: i loan because it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: i use words, pictures and colours to make people want to buy or use certain products.

lender.name: Mavis
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in life. Opportunities have often come my way. So, now I'm happy to be able to offer opportunities to others.
lender.occupational_info: Recently retired, I spent 36 years in adult education, teaching English and communication skills. Now I have more time for my 3 kids & 4 grandchildren.

lender.name: Mohamed
lender.loan_because: I would like to see a better world.

lender.name: Oshkimatisak
lender.loan_because: we feel it is necessary to support people all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We believe in social equality.

lender.name: Don and Donna
lender.loan_because: helping others has become more important than buying more stuff for ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are pastors of the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America. We proclaim the gospel of the forgiveness of sins in Jesus' name.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: As a small businessman myself, I know how hard it is to borrow money, even when you can see that you can make a profit.
lender.occupational_info: We sell and support a software package for residential letting agents.

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: it is better than giving as it helps the borrower being responsible towards the network who relied on him/her to live up to his/her word

lender.occupational_info: I create beautiful paintings, home goods and clothing because it is what I love.

lender.name: Tiziana
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way of empowering others to become more prosperous and share what we have
lender.occupational_info: Coming from my heart, fuelled by passion.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to help people help themselves and it is a gift that keeps giving .
lender.occupational_info: My work was very rewarding , and I am able to enjoy more time now with my children and grandchildren because of the work I did ..

lender.name: Sabrina Saleh
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great concept with a good cause and besides that, I think everybody deserves the chance to develop!

lender.occupational_info: Boring governmental work that pays the bills and allows me to have fun:)

lender.occupational_info: Find a listing of no deposit online casinos. You may ask yourself why and how can online casinos afford to give players free bonus money with no deposit required.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to empower others to make their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I help educators teach students about the world.

lender.name: Laszlo
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people get onto their own feet

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have learned to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying Economics at the American University of Paris. I am from Tempe, AZ, USA.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because:
The members of the San Diego Microfinance Alliance believe in the power of microfinance to alleviate poverty and empower the poor. We know that microfinance creates opportunities to improve lives, not just fleeting fortunes.
We realize we are privileged to live and work in the beautiful city of San Diego, and we feel that compared to much of the world, we have abundant resources. We want to share this wealth with entrepreneurs in developing countries. We host networking events, speakers series and provide a website that serves as an events calendar, jobs board, volunteer database, community forum, and news source.
lender.occupational_info: I am attorney turned social entrepreneur. I became a part of the San Diego Microfinance Alliance because I am dedicated to spreading awareness of and enthusiasm for microlending. I believe a great way to do that is by building a community right here among our own neighbors. Then we can meet, talk, share ideas, and help each other in our own endeavors and the endeavors of those in developing countries.

lender.name: Valery
lender.loan_because: I believe in microlending and the impact it has on the individual, the family unit, the community and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a microlending organization in the United States. As a loan officer I meet all of the new clients, visit their businesses, analyze their loans and make recommendations on approvals, then provide them with assistance during the term of their loan.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can, and prefer loans to donations
lender.occupational_info: developing teaching staff in Higher Education

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: Someone told me all the cool kids were doing it. (And I like to support small businesses and entrepreneurs.)
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and mother.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: I believe in women helping women.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: No one knows what the future will bring. But I think money is like luck; pass it along when you have it and the world seems more interesting and inviting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist. I am lucky to have work I love that allows me to write stories about everything from a shipwreck in Alaska to a trial in Russia.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe private citizens are able to help the less fortunate far more than a government is.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I've been given a lot of opportunities--most of which I have done very little to earn, if anything. I want to give someone else an opportunity to do something more, to reach for a better life.

lender.name: Mary Ellen
lender.loan_because: I also have a small business and support my family.
lender.occupational_info: I work with authors and organizations to make their words speak clearly to others.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I've been so blessed and because I so believe in what Kiva does and how they do it!

lender.name: LeeAnn
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make a greater impact in people's lives by giving them the tools to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Working towards a second degree in Communication Disorders.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I've had a lot of opportunities to succeed and I want to share that with other women!
lender.occupational_info: The non-profit organization I work for, CEDAM, supports over 200 groups in Michigan (U.S.) that help low-income people by providing housing, job training, food assistance, and many other services. My job is to get laws passed that will help them.

lender.name: Bob
lender.occupation: Full Time Justice Worker esp. Afrcia
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are one of two ways to eliminate global poverty. The other way is through Fair Trade products.
lender.occupational_info: I am a global justice worker and organizer. I help people to get micro loans.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to improve their life and community.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: the world needs more people who focus on others, instead of solely themselves
lender.occupational_info: Just trying to do the right thing

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: It's like donating blood. If you can do it, why wouldn't you? Little cost, high value.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying music composition.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: there is someone who needs it. It's that simple. If you have something someone else needs. Give it.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, I study and I work part time!

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: $25 invested in a Kiva loan will have the power to make a permanent, meaningful impact in the lives of hundreds of people over the course of its lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: Fulltime investor seeking to deploy capital where it can do the most good.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It's an effective way to build a new, people-centered economy.
lender.occupational_info: I design and sell smart-assed clothes for babies, toddlers, kiddos, and adults. Everything I have is cut and sewn by the Fair Trade Zone women's coop in Nicaragua. Lots of it is 100% organic cotton.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to show capitalism as the single greatest gift humanity has ever seen.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance development and the potential of creative people everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a university in New York City. I also write on topics in ethics and political philosophy, such as global justice.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I want the world to care more.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of things I believe are beautiful.

lender.name: anita
lender.loan_because: I want to share a bit of my good fortune. Women all over the world share a common bond; we learn as we grow and then pass on to our children our cultural knowledge.
lender.occupational_info: I design jewelry using old fasteners and buttons.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Microlending is a neato way for me to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I remember how hard live is when you are very poor. I am from La Loma de los Helechales of the barrio Yahuecas in Adjuntas, Puerto Rico.

Cancer Researcher, Medical School Professor, Biotechnology Entrepreneur... www.drtorres.org

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I change nappies, feed small children and hope that the weather will be sunny so that we can all play outside.

lender.name: Oakridge Varsity Soccer
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and make a lasting impression on the world as a team. This will be one of our lasting legacies.
lender.occupational_info: We are a tough group of girls & boys soccer players. Being a part of this team is more than just playing soccer.

lender.name: lara
lender.loan_because: ...it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an advertising agency, and create advertising campaigns that will promote products and services for my clients.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I believe in self-determination.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social worker for adults. I like old people. :-)

lender.name: Jini
lender.loan_because: I want to help people while preserving their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for non-profit organizations in the U.S.

lender.name: Estefan Gargost
lender.loan_because: I can. There's nothing better than helping those with the greatest need; and the fact that I can do so over and over again with such little money, is amazing!
lender.occupational_info:
Although I'm a painter, I've made an effort to use my art as a tool to help those in need. I do this by donating art or proceeds from my sales to non-profit or charitable organizations. Now that Ive discovered Kiva, thanks to President Clintons book Giving, I can help people further with the microloan system.
I hope to be part of this process for as long as I live.
Estefan Gargost

lender.name: Joppe & Danielle
lender.loan_because: Sharing to multiply!

lender.name: Lisa

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping these entrepreneurs is the best way to help their community rise from poverty. I believe in capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a bunch of people and work to maximize sales in our business while controlling expenses as much as possible.

lender.name: Malgorzata
lender.loan_because: Dignity is what we all need and deserve. And sharing & love is the highest joy!

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I can, I was born in a prosperous part of the world so I think I should help others who have to work hard to achieve what I got for free
lender.occupational_info: I work with money, buildings and people

lender.name: Gregg and Candice
lender.loan_because: It's not ours it's God's
lender.occupational_info: Gregg welds pipe for large buildings Candice assists eye doctors

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I sell instruments used in spine surgery and then go to surgery for technical support.

lender.name: Katheryn
lender.loan_because: I realize some people have dreams, but don't have the means. I'm an over-privileged teenager and I feel like this is a great way to give to those who don't have the same opportunities. I have the power to help.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am NOT the IMF and I don't believe in SAPs.
lender.occupational_info: I work with natural medicines such as herbs, homeopathy and acupunture to assist people in optimizing their health.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: I like the people to people giving opportunity

lender.name: Matthew B.
lender.loan_because: I travel all over the globe and I'm continually amazed at the ingenuity and perseverance of fellow entrepreneurs. I'm happy to help out and be a small part of each business I support.
lender.occupational_info: I build and create web solutions and strategies for companies and organizations that need solutions for specific industry-related challenges.

lender.name: Sanjayan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a helping hand.

lender.name: Hang-n-There
lender.loan_because: It is part of nonprofit project called Hang-n-There that recognizes that microfinance lending is an importnat tool that empowers people to help themselves out of poverty and achieve a better quality of life
lender.occupational_info: Through my Hang-n-Ther project I raise funds thru purchasing goods in developing countries and then sell the goods in the US and use a portion of the proceeds to make Kiva loans.

lender.name: Janae
lender.occupational_info: Brokers for Charityis a socially responsible real estate company donating to 501(c)(3)nonprofit organizationsthrough qualitycommercialandresidentialreal estate referrals throughout the United States and Canada.

lender.name: Pat Grady
lender.loan_because: "Teach a man to fish" means self-sufficiency to me, and I haven't found a more inspiring way to truly support that ideal than Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Selling goods on the Internet.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in empowering women all over the world, especially women from countries less fortunate than the U.S. I have met women in my travels to Africa and India who had such a wonderful spirit and attitude despite their circumstances. I was very humbled by their strong will to make a change in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company, but I just finished my Master of Social Work. I am hoping to make a career change sometime this year.

lender.name: Cleo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: ADW
lender.loan_because: ...I'd like to help people and increase positive energy in the world.....grateful to live in a prosperous nation....

lender.loan_because: It makes me feel really, really, really good.
lender.occupational_info: I am an information systems consultant and a committed Rotarian.

lender.name: Johnny & Jimmy
lender.loan_because: We finally have a chance to be able to help others out.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I believe in sustainable charities and investments. The concept of recycling your investment for the good of many, reduces risk and maximizes impact. Win win for everyone, particularly the ones in need.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur myself, founded and started a high-tech business to discover new cures for infectious diseases.

lender.name: Emma-Tei
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world, in a way that i don't have to be famous, rich or powerful to make a difference

lender.name: Karon
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy to help other women who are working to support their families
lender.occupational_info: Supervise teams of people doing back office work to support Christian ministry to university and college students.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: helping someone who cannot help me is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and people who are not able to use this stuff...

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want others to live a fulfilling life and be able to reach his/her potential just like I have been given the opportunity to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my brothers who sell AT&T products and services; i.e. cellular phones, accessories, etc.

lender.name: Joo Viegas
lender.loan_because: It feels good...

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to share some joy and I love this concept. I can make a $50 loan to one person, if they pay it back I can help someone else with the same $50. It's the only way I know how to recycle money!
lender.occupational_info: My day to day job is organic synthesis-I get to create new molecules with the hope of developing a new treatment for a major disease( like arthritis or hepatitis for example). But because I want to reach patients directly, I'm starting medical school this fall.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference no matter how big or small.
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting work for trust clients

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: the inability to access capital has limited individual lives and deprived civilization of immeasurable talent throughout history.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I, myself am a business owner. It's nice to help other business in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a few websites and try to make money out of them.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: To help hard working people get out of poverty and prosper in their life.

lender.name: Lorelei
lender.loan_because: I want to give people opportunities.

lender.name: Sylvia Chappell
lender.loan_because: In memory of Sylvia Lee Chappell, 1953-2009

lender.name: Sherrie
lender.loan_because: It feels right to help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Marame
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I'm a sucker for the needy.

lender.name: Ronnie Kasumba
lender.loan_because: I have been in such situations before. Therefore, I ultimately know what it means to be in a needy situation; hence, a need to have support.
lender.occupational_info: I am not living an easy life. Because, I have a duty to financially sustain myself through University education, yet I have a desire to help others in similar financial situations.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to do something for others.
lender.occupational_info: Work for a Christian church as a minister.

lender.name: John Galt
lender.loan_because: "The world you desire can be won, it exists, it is real, it is possible, it's yours. But to win it requires total dedication and a total break with the world of your past, with the doctrine that man is a sacrificial animal who exists for the pleasure of others. Fight for the value of your person. Fight for the virtue of your pride. Fight for the essence which is man, for his sovereign rational mind. Fight with the radiant certainty and the absolute rectitude of knowing that yours is the morality of life and yours is the battle for any achievement, any value, any grandeur, any goodness, any joy that has ever existed on this earth."
lender.occupational_info: "Show me your achievement, and the knowledge will give me courage for mine."

lender.name: Bruce & Kim
lender.loan_because: we feel fortunate to have been born in Canada, an affluent country. Kiva provides us with an opportunity to assist some wonderful people, in other parts of the world, to realize their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Bruce works as a Sales & Marketing Manager for an electrical connector manufacturer. Kim works in an office in Calgary's oil and gas industry.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to help those who need it and this was a very simple way of doing it. :)
lender.occupational_info: Training to be an Orthopaedic Tech or PAC (Doctor's Assistant).

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Together we will achieve our goal.
lender.occupational_info: repair photocopiers, faxes and other multifunction office products

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Being a small business owner myself, I know what it's like to just scrape by. Even though I can't give much, it makes me happy to give what I can. I also love the idea of being able to recycle the loan money to others. It's like a never ending helping chain!
lender.occupational_info: I currently create handmade fashion accessories for women (mostly hair accessories). I hope to someday open my own bakery/cafe!

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I care about people, and their overall wellbeing!

lender.name: Bjrn Ole
lender.loan_because: Friends, you and me... you brought another friend... and then there were three... we started our group... our circle of friends... and like that circle... there is no beginning or end.
lender.occupational_info: Constructing software design

lender.name: JUAN
lender.loan_because: Feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a Combat Medic for 22 years. Now I do the same thing without the cammouflage, the bullets and the explosions. It is a lot easier now without all the distractions and noise.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to...

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: The beauty in the shortness of life is helping our global family.

lender.name: Simone

lender.loan_because: We love retail

lender.occupational_info: I create software.

lender.name: Jutta Felke
lender.occupation: I work in a bank as a wealth manager.
lender.loan_because: I like to give a litle help and hope for a better life to some people in other countries

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Patrik Mller
lender.loan_because: I support those who make their own luck.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I like what it represents. Its a way of making a difference in other people's lives in countries where the need is great.
lender.occupational_info: a senior executive in the technology technology space.

lender.name: J.T.
lender.occupation: Cable TV / Internet / Digital phone Technician
lender.loan_because:
I want to make a difference in the lives of families in countries that they have to struggle so much on a day-by-day basis. This gives me an opportunity to help improve the world, one little loan at a time.
**The Power of Attitude** "Our lives are not determined by what happens to us, but by how we react to what happens; not by what life brings to us, but by the attitude we bring to life. A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes. It is a catalyst...a spark that creates extraordinary results." Author Unknown....

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that produces translations of all sorts of technical documents, mostly medical documents. My job is to edit them - to make sure the translation is accurate. Most of these are related to testing to make sure that new drugs really work the way they're supposed to. Most of the time I edit documents translated from German to English, but sometimes I edit other languages as well.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to get money directly to those who are in the most need of help with their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who teaches drawing at several colleges in Boston USA.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: All to Jesus I Surrender,
lender.occupational_info: A passion of gratitude.

lender.name: Elishia
lender.loan_because: I can make that impact.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I have enough money to give out small loans and I want to assist people in being able to support themselves, too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an accountant in the public service - I work for the garbage collection / street cleaning company in Hannover, Germany. Yes, they need accountants, too! *g*

lender.name: Todd Skene
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are an important part of the community and economy. I enjoy working with entrepreneurs, innovators, and small businesses and learning about different businesses and how they operate. Entrepreneurs are creative and enterprising people who take risks; I believe they need a good community support network and I loan because it will help the entrepreneur succeed. A successful business helps all of the businesses associated with that business and ultimately the livelihoods of the owners, employees, and their families.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone be a little better off tomorrow than they are today. I hope to play some part in that.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I am cool
lender.occupational_info: Nice very Nice

lender.name: cRaig+Julia
lender.loan_because: God has given us the resources to help others
lender.occupational_info: We're a family, just trying to do the best we can.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I know that a lot of people have good ideas and they need access to money to help turn those ideas into reality. I loan because it feels good to help someone achieve success! I loan because we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: 32 years of public service - I currently work for State Department of Transportation in the Construction Section specializing in Concrete Quality and review of concrete mix designs for compliance with project specifications.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people and in the process save money for when I'm older. My friend James M gave me some money to get me going...

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a large impact with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Neeru

lender.name: Students For Change
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in a better way. We believe that as young people in this world, it is our job to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: For peace, love and happiness we strive to make a difference.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.loan_because: it is a way of giving people the helping hand with the ability of making them stand on their own.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs in their goal to improve their own standard of living as well as others in their communities. I want to help reduce the world-wide income inequality.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in Washington D.C. I study history, and I love it!

lender.name: Genesta
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I believe in what this organization promotes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker. I support people in crisis that come to the emergency department of the hospital.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I have had been blessed many times in my life and would love to help those in need just as GOD has blessed me with kind friends.
lender.occupational_info: I provide my clientele w/ parties and entertainment for bachelor and bachelorette parties as well as retirement.

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: grass roots capitalism is where it's at
lender.occupational_info: I run some pilates studios with my wife

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility as a member of the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with at-risk high school students.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their life.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe giving people the chance to help themselves is the only way to end poverty

lender.name: Ada
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a Community College.

lender.name: Moola for Miracles
lender.loan_because: Our Mission Statement: "Actively supporting and strengthening women to achieve financial literacy and economic well-being through education, monetary support and friendship."
lender.occupational_info: Our Vision Statement: "Women in need of support will become self-sufficient through financing of their micro enterprises, creating abundance and sustainability for themselves, their families and the communities in which they live." Our Values are based on the writings of Angeles Arrien in her book "The Four-Fold Way" 1. Show up and choose to be present. 2. Pay attention to what has heart and meaning 3. Tell the truth without blame or judgment. 4. Open to outcome, not attached to outcome.

lender.name: MUJEEB
lender.loan_because: I want to open small business like a cafe to take care of my family. I have 2 kids & not working wife.
lender.occupational_info: I need a rent a space & buy necessary equipment to start of my small business. I hope anybody will respond. Thank you.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations (NGOs) build their capacity by training/facilitation in fundraising, strategic planning and board development.

lender.name: Onika
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe with a little bit of human generosity we can make a world of difference. Its an obligation as a member of the human race to help in anyway that I can, even if it is just $25.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with scientists to improve our understanding of the world through high performance computer simulation.

lender.name: Jeff Hodges
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of passionate entrepreneurs out there that need only a slight hand up to become extremely productive members of society. There was a time when I needed that hand up and I know what it feels like to NOT get it !!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and small businesses providing success training / coaching as well as hypno-therapy to help them overcome obstacles and enhance their performance.

lender.name: The Riggs Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes : )

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Other people can benefit much more than I can for what is generally considered a 'small' amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I manage medical device development programs.

lender.name: Kim & Jim
lender.loan_because: it is easy to do and does so much good!
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people about the plants and animals that live in the state of Missouri.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage others to be successful. I want to help promote financial planning skills to encourage people to make sound decisions not only for their own future, but for the future of their community. I also loan because I hope that those who benefit from Kiva will one day be able to pass on the favour.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math and science to children between the ages of 12 and 14. I love my job because it helps me connect with so many people in various ways, on different levels.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is a very good idea: To help people help themselves. Helen Keller said it so well: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish humble tasks as though they were great and noble. The world is moved along, not only by the mighty shoves of its heroes, but also by the aggregate of the tiny pushes of each honest worker."
lender.occupational_info: I work with magazine publishers.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: "To you the earth yields her fruit, and you shall not want if you but know how to fill your hands. It is in exchanging the gifts of the earth that you shall find abundance and be satisfied. Yet unless the exchange be in love and kindly justice, it will but lead some to greed and others to hunger. And before you leave the marketplace, see that no one has gone his way with empty hands. For the master spirit of the earth shall not sleep peacefully upon the wind till the needs of the least of you are satisfied. " -Khalil Gibran, "The Prophet"

lender.name: Kevin and Nicole
lender.occupation: Car Sales and CEO of the house!
lender.loan_because: Our Uncle gave it to us as a gift that will keep on giving. Should be fun and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: Kevin- sells cars to people. Nicole- makes our house a home, and is going to school to be a nurse.

lender.name: Dala
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my life and believe every human being deserves the opportunity to live, love and grow.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at Purdue University, pursuing a Masters of Fine Arts. My thesis involves designing educational facilities in developing countries.

lender.name: Tuyet Huong Nguyen
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Day Treatment facility for those with mental illness.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by so many people, and I want to "Pay It Forward."
lender.occupational_info: A Professional Genealogist helps people find information about their ancestors. I also work reviewing medical claims.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I am able. In this world we have forgotten how to interact. I support people who are involved with each other. As a college student I am so fortunate that if I weren't doing something I would not be doing the right thing. These people are proactive and are making a difference. I should too.
lender.occupational_info: I go to the University of Central Oklahoma, where I study Marketing. I work at Chilis to get through college. I love what I do. I get to go to work and interact with some cool people.

lender.name: Shermon
lender.occupation: Executive Assistant to the Governor, Ilocos Norte

lender.name: The Kids
lender.loan_because: We can.
